5-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(t.title) AS typical_european_movie
 FROM cat_company_type_1 AS ct,
 cat_info_type_1 AS it,
 cat_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
 cat_movie_info_1 AS mi,
 cat_title_1 AS t
 WHERE t.id = mi.movie_id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
 AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id
 AND it.id = mi.info_type_id
 AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
 AND mc.note LIKE '%a%'
 AND mc.note LIKE '%a%'
 AND mi.info IN ('Finland:16 November 2001', 'UK:23 August 1995', 'Distant Thunder', 'USA:25 January 1935', 'â¬ 278,920 (Spain)')
 AND t.production_year > 2000;

Whoever lights the Christmas Candle receives a miracle on Christmas Eve But in 1890, at the dawn of the modern age, all that is about to change. With the arrival of David Richmond, a skeptical, young minister, Gladbury''s humble candlemaker, Edward Haddington must fight to preserve his family''s legacy.
